name: pass
chn: vi. & vt. 通过; 结束; 传递
example_en: She passed the exam with flying colors.
example_cn: 她以优异的成绩通过了考试。
memory_tips: 词源：来自拉丁语 'passus'，意为'步'或'跨步'。联想记忆：想象自己在考试中'跨过'了所有难题，顺利通过。图像记忆：想象一个学生高兴地跨过一道门，象征着通过考试。

image_prompt.main_image: A student happily stepping over a threshold with a graduation cap on, symbolizing passing an exam.
image_prompt.example_image: A classroom scene where a teacher is handing over a test paper with a big 'A' grade to a smiling student.

collocations: pass the test (通过考试); pass the time (消磨时间); pass the ball (传球)
